projects.name: Jirawala MCP Server
projects.description: Transformed Jirawala Slack bot into a sophisticated Model Context Protocol (MCP) server enabling natural language Jira operations. Implemented Spring AI @Tool annotations framework for conversational AI interfaces.
highlights: Architected MCP server infrastructure for enterprise AI-assisted workflows
Enabled natural language Jira project creation and user lookup
Built self-service automation serving thousands of Netflix engineers
Integrated with Netflix Productivity Assistant ecosystem
Implemented comprehensive error handling and metatron authentication
projects.impact: Reduced manual Jira operations by 80% and enabled AI-assisted project management for 5000+ users

projects.name: Netflix Productivity Assistant
projects.description: Lead contributor to Netflix's enterprise AI productivity ecosystem. Integrated GitHub Copilot into Slack channels and built AI-assisted development workflows.
highlights: Pioneered collaborative AI-assisted coding sessions in Slack
Built bitbot for intelligent code analysis and pattern recognition
Integrated AI workflows across multiple development environments
Created comprehensive knowledge bases with Jira integration
projects.impact: Enhanced developer productivity across Netflix engineering teams, reducing debugging cycles by 60%

projects.name: Ad Operations Pipeline
projects.description: Comprehensive custom Jira project and automation system for Netflix Ad Operations team, transforming campaign management workflows and reporting.
highlights: Built real-time dashboards for $30M+ revenue tracking
projects.impact: Streamlined management of $30M+ in advertising revenue with 70% reduction in manual processes

projects.name: Project Godzilla - Atlassian Migration
projects.description: Led massive Atlassian Data Center to Cloud migration for over 5000 external partners while ensuring zero downtime and operational continuity.
projects.impact: Successfully migrated enterprise Atlassian infrastructure serving 5000+ external partners with zero service interruption

projects.name: Nitsuah Labs Portfolio
projects.description: Full-stack React portfolio website showcasing Web3 projects, blockchain development, and 3D interactive experiences. Built with modern technologies and deployed on Netlify.
highlights: Built multi-page React application with Web3 integration
Implemented NFT minting and domain name service
projects.impact: Showcases technical versatility across modern web technologies and blockchain development

projects.name: Remora - Privileged Access Management
projects.description: Advanced Privileged Access Management (PAM) tool built with Microsoft Access, Excel, and VBA. Manages user access, artifacts, and role-based access controls across multiple systems.
highlights: Built comprehensive user access management system
Created file health checking and cleanup automation
Developed batch loading systems for signatory documents
Built reporting dashboards for compliance audits
projects.impact: Streamlined privileged access management for enterprise security operations teams

projects.name: Sampler - Advanced PDF Processing
projects.description: Advanced PDF random sampling tool that automates mouse movements and PDF interactions for document processing and analysis. Built for compliance and audit sampling needs.
highlights: Automated PDF splitting and sampling based on text patterns
Created calibration system for screen interactions
Implemented random page generation for compliance sampling
projects.impact: Automated manual PDF processing tasks, reducing processing time by 90%

projects.name: VMT - Vulnerability & Asset Management
projects.description: Basic Assets & Vulnerability Management system that stores IT equipment lists and tracks vulnerabilities across multiple systems with reporting capabilities.
highlights: Built comprehensive IT asset tracking system
projects.impact: Centralized IT asset and vulnerability management for improved security posture

projects.name: Web3 & NFT Development Projects
projects.description: Collection of Web3 and NFT projects including smart contracts, minting platforms, and blockchain interactions built during Buildspace cohorts.
highlights: Developed multiple smart contracts for NFT minting
projects.impact: Demonstrated proficiency in blockchain development and Web3 ecosystem

projects.name: Coinbase IT Automation Suite
projects.description: Comprehensive automation suite including product launch calendar, MNPI compliance, and audit automation supporting $400M+ in tax refunds.
highlights: Built product launch approval workflow automation
Created SOC & R+D expense artifact automation
projects.impact: Automated critical business processes supporting millions of global customers and $400M+ in financial operations

projects.name: PowerShell Automation Utilities
projects.description: Collection of PowerShell scripts for system administration, log management, server detection, and file processing automation.
highlights: Built intelligent server type detection scripts
Developed CSV to Excel conversion tools
Implemented LDAP search and cleanup automation
projects.impact: Streamlined system administration tasks across Windows environments
